original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, posts as p, postHistory as ph, badges as b, users as u WHERE u.Id = c.UserId AND u.Id = p.OwnerUserId AND u.Id = ph.UserId AND u.Id = b.UserId AND p.PostTypeId=1 AND p.Score<=35 AND p.AnswerCount=1 AND p.CommentCount<=17 AND p.FavoriteCount>=0 AND b.Date>=CAST('2010-07-27 17:58:45' AS TIMESTAMP) AND b.Date<=CAST('2014-09-06 17:33:22' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.Views<=233 AND u.DownVotes<=2 AND u.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-09-16 16:00:55' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-08-24 21:12:02' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges WHERE CAST(badges.Date AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-27 17:58:45' AND CAST(badges.Date AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-06 17:33:22'

CREATE VIEW E5 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.Views <= 233 AND users.DownVotes <= 2 AND (CAST(users.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-09-16 16:00:55' AND CAST(users.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-08-24 21:12:02')
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E4E5 AS SELECT * FROM E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E5 WHERE E4.UserId=E5.Id)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E4E5E3 AS SELECT * FROM E4E5 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E4E5.UserId=E3.UserId)
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE posts.PostTypeId = 1 AND posts.Score <= 35 AND posts.AnswerCount = 1 AND posts.CommentCount <= 17 AND posts.FavoriteCount >= 0
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E4E5E3E2 AS SELECT * FROM E4E5E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E4E5E3.UserId=E2.OwnerUserId)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E4E5E3E2 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4E5E3E2 WHERE E1.UserId=E4E5E3E2.UserId)
